iraFederalRequirement.ratioDescription: 15% apprentice labor hours on IRA/IIJA-funded clean energy projects over $1 million
iraFederalRequirement.notes: Federal requirement for enhanced clean energy tax credits. Applies nationwide regardless of state law. Began 2023, percentage increases over time.
